sentence.text: Exome analysis of APA has allowed the identification of recurrent somatic mutations in potassium ion import across plasma membrane, calcium ion transport, cellular sodium ion homeostasis, and regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration in more than 50 % of sporadic cases.

entity.text: potassium ion import across plasma membrane
regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration

sentence.text: The negative regulation of cell proliferation mutations were also identified in cortisol-producing adenomas and adrenal cancer, but their role in APA development and the mechanisms specifying the hormonal production or the malignant phenotype remain unknown.
